doc:
Peter Hardy (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Hardy_(actor) 0 Ben Jones (born 2 January 1991), known professionally as Ben Hardy, is an English actor known for playing Peter Beale in the BBC soap opera EastEnders (2013–2015). Hardy made his film debut as Archangel in the superhero film X-Men: Apocalypse (2016), and played Roger Taylor in the biographical film Bohemian Rhapsody (2018). Ben_Jones ( born_2_January_1991 ) , known professionally as Ben_Hardy , is an_English_actor known for playing Peter_Beale in the_BBC_soap_opera_EastEnders ( 2013 – 2015 ) . Hardy made his_film_debut as Archangel in the_superhero_film_X-Men : Apocalypse_(_2016_) , and played Roger_Taylor in the_biographical_film_Bohemian_Rhapsody_(_2018_) .
